tool.name: SendJobNotification
tool.summary: This GP tool sends a job notification for the specified job. (The details about the message, recipients, etc. are all contained in the Workflow Manager notification itself.)
tool.usage: • The default Workflow Manager database must be set before running this tool.

param.name: in_long_jobId
param.displayname: ID of job for which the notification will be sent
param.dialogReference: The ID of the job for which the notification will be sent.
param.pythonReference: The ID of the job for which the notification will be sent.

param.name: in_string_notificationName
param.dialogReference: The name of the notification to be sent for the specified job.
param.pythonReference: The name of the notification to be sent for the specified job.

param.name: in_string_wmxDatabaseAlias
param.dialogReference: An optional parameter specifying that this tool should run on some database other than the default Workflow Manager database. If left blank, the default Workflow Manager database will be used.
param.pythonReference: An optional parameter specifying that this tool should run on some database other than the default Workflow Manager database. If left blank, the default Workflow Manager database will be used.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This GP tool sends a job notification for the specified job. (The details about the message, recipients, etc. are all contained in the Workflow Manager notification itself.)
